data.name: Hentai Seek Girl - hentai game
data.detailed_description:
Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Hentai Seek Girl\hentaiseekgirl\Game.exe

This DLC is a girl touch game.
It is a new illustration of a girl who appeared in the game.
There are also erotic nude illustrations.
The illustration moves, and there is audio.

how to play:
Touch the heart to fill the gauge.
When it is full, an erotic event will occur.


This game contains explicit consensual sex scenes. The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, such as but not limited to male/female explicit sex scenes, female/female, vaginal/oral/anal sex, toys, seduction, and consensual BDSM.
